summary: Adds craftable bandanas in 8 colour variants
descriptionHtml:
[center][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/1964/?][img]http://i.imgur.com/MFH9yvd.png[/img][/url][line]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/CYeES.png[/img]
This mod adds a craftable [color=#f4a460][size=4][b]'Bandana'[/b][/size][/color] to the game of Skyrim


[size=4][b][color=#f4a460].:[/color] FULL Beast Race Support [color=#f4a460]:.[/color][/b][/size]


It comes in two versions (normal and tied), in 8 colour variants: Normal(brown cloth), Red, Magenta, Blue, Green, Yellow, White and Black.
They use [color=#f4a460][b]New Slots[/b][/color] so they can be worn with any Helmet, Circlet or Robe


[color=#f4a460].:[/color] Uses Slot [[color=#f4a460]#60[/color]] [color=#f4a460]:.[/color]

[line]
[b]If you feel the default colours are too much for your tastes, try this retexture from the one and only [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/3575696][size=3]'Brokefoot'[/size][/url][/b]

I worked closely with [color=#f4a460][b]'Brokefoot'[/b][/color] to ensure a top quality retexture mod, more suited to the vanilla Skyrim colour spectrum.
Kudos to him and his work on this, and of course, don't forget to [color=#f4a460][b]Endorse[/b][/color] if you like the mods!
[line][/center]

[img]http://i.imgur.com/Brwj4.png[/img]
You can craft the [color=#f4a460][b]'Bandana'[/b][/color] using any [color=#f4a460][b]'Tanning Rack'[/b][/color] under the [color=#f4a460][b]'Leather'[/b][/color] section.

To craft the [color=#f4a460][b]'Bandana'[/b][/color], you will need:
[list]
[*] 1 Linen Wrap
[/list]
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/nuGb2.jpg[/img][/center]

[img]http://i.imgur.com/iZy5l.png[/img]
[list][*] Download with Nexus Mod Manager and make sure its checked under the Mods tab.
[*] Or download manualy and extract to your \Data folder in your Skyrim directory. Then make sure the 'Bandanas of Skyrim.esp' file is active in the Data section of your SkyrimLauncher.exe.
[/list]



[img]http://i.imgur.com/JJ6mB.png[/img]
[u][b]v1.0[/b][/u]
- Initial release
- Adds craftable [b]'Bandana'[/b] to the game

[u][b]v1.1[/b][/u]
- Changed [b]'Bandana'[/b] armour slot to use slot #60




[center]
[size=4][b][color=#f4a460].:[/color] Like this? Then you may also like this [color=#f4a460]:.[/color][/b][/size]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13551][img]http://i.imgur.com/Acvb6.png[/img][/url][/center]
